staff.name: Bri Johnson - CEO
staff.description: Meet our CEO! Bri Johnson is a Freshman at Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University in Florida. She is currently majoring in Astrophysics and Global Conflict.

staff.name: Aayan Rahat - COO
staff.description: Meet our COO! Aayan Rahat is a junior at Centennial High School in Texas. He plans to study computer science.

staff.name: Jay Wankhede - CTO
staff.description: Meet our CTO! Jay Wankhede is a senior at Poolesville Highschool. He plans to pursue  computer science with a focus on machine learning.

staff.name: Khandaker Wasi (Wasi) -  CFO
staff.description: Meet our CFO! Khandaker Wasi is a Junior at Poolesville High School in Maryland. He is interested in biology, more specifically Neuroscience

staff.name: Maani Prasad - Senior Marketing Officer
staff.description: Meet our SMO! Maansi Prasad is a Senior at Centennial High School in Texas. She is planning on pursuing a career in global businesses

staff.name: Krish Putta - Marketing Officer
staff.description: Meet Our Marketing Officer! Krish Putta is a Sophmore at Poolesville High School in Maryland. He is in the Science Math and Computer Science Program looking to pursue a career in business and computer science.

staff.name: Gordon Chang - Outreach Director
staff.description: Gordon is a freshman at University of California, Irvine. He is currently majoring in Biomedical Engineering.
